text: gaa pono di lohongo o tenua hagatau, ga helekai gi digaula, “Goodou e aha ala guu hai di godou hai huaidu hai baahi gi di God o Israel? Goodou gu hai baahi ang gi Dimaadua i di godou hau di gowaa hai tigidaumaha adu gi goodou! Goodou guu hai digau hagalee daudali a Mee!22.16 Deuteronomy 12.13-14
